title: Teen Suicide Prompts OpenAI To Add Parental Controls To ChatGPT, Here's What To Expect
description: Artificial intelligence organisation OpenAI has announced plans to introduce parental controls for ChatGPT after an American couple claimed the AI encouraged their teenage son to take his own life. In a blog post, the California-based AI company said it was partnering with experts to guide their work, and leveraging reasoning models for sensitive moments with focus on "strengthening protections for teens".
